thread.title: Guest lineups for the Sunday news shows
thread.title_full: Guest lineups for the Sunday news shows - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Guest lineups for the Sunday news shows
text:
WASHINGTON (AP) - Guest lineups for the Sunday TV news shows:
ABC's "This Week" - Democratic presidential candidate Bernie Sanders; Republican presidential candidate Ben Carson; Reps. Adam Kinzinger, R-Ill., and Tulsi Gabbard, D-Hawaii.
___
NBC's "Meet the Press" - Republican presidential candidate Ted Cruz; Reps. Adam Schiff, D-Calif., and Mike Pompeo, R-Kans.
___
CBS' "Face the Nation" - Reps. Trey Gowdy, R-S.C., and Elijah Cummings, D-Md.
___
CNN's "State of the Union" - Republican presidential candidate Jeb Bush; 2012 Republican presidential nominee Mitt Romney.
___
"Fox News Sunday" - Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump.
